name: The Tomb Of The Pharoahs
description:
Great golden sarcophogai line the walls of this massive tomb.  It has
withstood the passage of time intact, untouched by the hands of thieves
and looters.  The treasures taken by the pharoahs to their graves still
lie before your feet.

exits.description: That way leads back out of the tomb.
exits.keywords: tomb~ 1 -1 5344 E treasures~ The treasures are dusty and fragile, but still seem quite valuable. You decide not to take them out of respect for the ancient dead.

exits.description: From here you see only darkness.
